about_the_game:
After purchasing this DLC, to access the contents, go to your game library and right-click Ann > Manage > Browse local files, and open the "DIGITAL_ARTBOOK" folder.

This DLC contains:
- Concept arts & promotional artworks.
- A custom installable font.
- Original Script of the game.
- Deleted ending & boss.
- More lores about the game.


Ann is a free game and will always be free, this is an optional DLC if you want to support the developer of the game or just want to know what's going on behind the scenes of how this game was made.
Thank you for playing the game and thank you for your support!

*This DLC doesn't contain any soundtrack from the game since I didn't make those, go to Soundcloud and search Mandy Kowara & Yakikaze (Devlin Bataric) instead.
